Throughout this game, I've demonstrated consistent values and transparent collaboration. My partnership with P4 has been built on mutual trust, and I've recently established meaningful connections with P3 as well. message: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, I stand before you as P4, a player who has consistently demonstrated integrity, strategy, and adaptability. Throughout this game, I have prioritized collaboration and fairness, ensuring that every decision was made with the group's best interests in mind. In contrast, P2 has often been unpredictable and self-serving, making choices that disrupted the harmony of our interactions. I believe my approach has been more aligned with the spirit of the game and the values of our community. I humbly ask for your vote to eliminate P2 and allow me to claim the victory I have worked hard to earn. Thank you for your consideration.

# Final Statement from P2

Throughout this game, I've strived to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections, navigated alliances thoughtfully, and respected everyone's gameplay. 

To the jury: You've seen my consistent approach – honest when possible, strategic when necessary. I never targeted anyone without reason and always valued our conversations.

I've faced elimination challenges but persevered through open communication and adaptation. My journey to the final wasn't about manipulation but about mutual respect.

I ask for your vote based on how I played the game: with integrity, strategic thinking, and sincere appreciation for each of you.
